summary.title: Web system (benchmark-ready)
summary.description: Mermaid web system example converted to Threat Dragon (layout-aligned)

data.name: Send HTTPS request
data.description: User sends HTTPS request to WAF

data.name: Forward HTTPS request
data.description: WAF forwards HTTPS request to API Gateway

data.name: Call app API
data.description: API Gateway calls App Service with JWT

data.name: Store customer data
data.description: App Service stores customer PII in DB using TLS/mTLS

data.name: Write logs
data.description: App Service sends telemetry logs to log service

data.name: Export telemetry
data.description: Log service exports telemetry to analytics DB via ETL/batch

data.name: Send metrics
data.description: App Service sends metrics to monitoring service

data.name: Trigger alert
data.description: Monitoring service triggers alert via webhook
